comments: Apart from initial terms, exponents in expansion of A065472 as a product zeta(n)^(-a(n)).
links: G. Niklasch, Some number theoretical constants: 1000-digit values [Cached copy]
N. J. A. Sloane, Euler transform
formula: a(n) = 1/n*Sum_{d divides n} (-1)^(d+1)*mobius(n/d)*2^d. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 06 2002G.f.: Sum_{n>=1} moebius(n)*log(1 + 2*x^n)/n, where moebius(n)=A008683(n). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 13 2010
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
